description:
Wow! We dodged a bullet with this one!

Kamala is flabbergasted, as she cannot comprehend how she was able to coin the phrase, “You exist in the context in which you exist,” or something like that.

It’s unclear if she’s forgotten that she has repeated it at least 500 times in the past several months, but it was not until now that she publicly affirmed how impressed she is with herself.


NEW: Kamala Harris shocks herself after thinking she said something smart while dropping her famous "context in which you exist" line.

I must say, this was impressive.

"And as we approach and I ask you to remember the context in which you exist."

"Yeah, I did that," Harris… pic.twitter.com/6XZrWYg7d7
title: Kamala Harris's latest word salad SHOCKS even her: "Yeah, I did that”

description:
The City of San Francisco is no longer part of the civilized world, as officials and voters have done everything possible to make it that way. However, this does not mean everyone condones anarchy. This is why one San Francisco barista had to do what any rational person would do when an attempted robber tried to go after an unsuspecting person.

HERO ALERT: San Francisco barista fights off would-be robber until police arrive pic.twitter.com/tM7E91cks9
— Breaking911 (@Breaking911) December 17, 2024


It’s one thing if you
title: Watch: San Francisco barista gets fed up, takes down robber while waiting for cops to show up

description:
Since the Panny D, “the science” was hijacked by radical progressives with an agenda. Subsequently, “the science” turned into leftist Dogma and has been captured since.

Scott Jennings said what everyone thinks amid RFK’s nomination, which is that America needs to “ make science actual science again.”


Best argument RFK can make for his HHS nomination: let’s make science actual science again. During COVID, “the science” became a religion and millions of kids and people suffered for it. My latest on @cnn. pic.twitter.com/jrEAgs0lLk
— Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY)
title: Scott Jennings: "The Science" Became Leftist Dogma At The Expense Of Truth

description:
15-year-old Natalie “Samantha” Rupnow brought a handgun to Abundant Life Christian Academy in Madison, Wisconsin,, and the public is yearning for details. Today’s show brings you everything we could find to tell you the truth.

"When the left decides that certain shootings you won't know about and certain shootings you will know about, the agenda is dangerous," Crowder said.
title: Watch: Femcel Shooter? Exploring Madison Shooting Myths One By One

description:
Due to recent news events, I figured we could all start off the day with a laugh. This tweet cracks me up and further proves that JK Rowling is one of us. Not so much politically, outside our shared belief that men can't be women and that one should not have their lives destroyed for having a belief that men can't be women.

Though, should you find yourself being canceled for opposing allowing boys on the girls' field hockey or volleyball teams, Rowling knows just who to call.
title: Jk Rowling drops an AMAZING A-Team reference mocking wokescolds who believe "women have d*cks"

description:
15-year-old Natalie “Samantha” Rupnow brought a handgun to Abundant Life Christian Academy in Madison, Wisconsin, yesterday, and Americans are yearning for details, we’ve sifted through everything we could find to bring you the truth, President Donald Trump was asked about the upcoming TikTok ban and his answer left us with more questions, inspired by a chat question from one of our supporters, we have prepared a detailed explanation of how accessible homeschooling is in the United States today, and so much more!

Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.
title: Sources: Debunking Wisconsin Shooter Myths One By One
